name: Seventh International Conference on Logistics and Supply Chain Management
content: Seventh International Conference on Logistics and Supply Chain Management 2020 (LSCM 2020) aims at providing a platform to transfer experience, and scientific and research findings of the recent theoretical and practical achievements of logistics and supply chain in both research and industry. The conference is also going to provide an environment through expert panels where stakeholders of different industry sectors such as automotive, food, tourism, and petroleum can express their diverse viewpoints on various issues affecting logistics and supply chain, and raise qualitative discussion. One other specific aspect of the conference is its additional plans, including useful workshops, the best PhD award, Meta-heuristics algorithms game, and many other programs. The selected English papers of the conference will get published in Springerâ€™s CCIS book series. CCIS is abstracted/indexed in DBLP, Google Scholar, EI-Compendex, Mathematical Reviews, SCImago, and Scopus. CCIS volumes are also submitted for the inclusion in ISI Proceedings.
organizers: Kharazmi University, Iran Logistics Society, Amadgaran SCM Group
